headline: Amcor (AMCR) Reports Transition To Net Loss Of US$39 Million In Q4 2025 Earnings
summary: Amcor (AMCR) recently announced a quarterly dividend of USD 0.13 per share and reported its Q4 2025 earnings results, showing substantial sales growth to USD 5,082 million, up from USD 3,535 million a year ago, but a transition from net income to a net loss of USD 39 million. Despite these earnings figures and steady dividend announcements, Amcor's share price recorded an 8.82% decline over the last quarter, which contrasts with the broader market's positive trend. Market uncertainties, such...

headline: Amcor expands healthcare packaging network with facility in Costa Rica
summary: The latest facility will focus on speed of service and simplified customs management.

headline: Macquarie Small Cap Value Fund Q2 2025 Commentary
summary: For 2Q25, the Macquarie Small Cap Value Fund Institutional Class shares outpaced its benchmark, the Russell 2000 Value Index. Read more here.

headline: Amcor plc (AMCR) Reports Strong Fiscal Q4 Results
summary: Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) is included in our list of the 11 Best Single Digit Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) posted strong fiscal Q4 results on August 14, 2025, driven by the April 30 all-stock acquisition of Berry Global, a manufacturer of plastic packaging products. headline: Baird Lowers PT on Amcor (AMCR) to $10 From $11, Keeps Neutral Rating
summary: Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) is one of the most buzzing stocks to invest in right now. On August 15, Baird lowered the firm’s price target on Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) to $10 from $11, keeping a Neutral rating on the shares.
